articles.author: Wesley Rahn
articles.title: Europe heat wave continues as UN chief warns of 'new normal' - DW
articles.description: Record-breaking heat continues to scorch most of Western Europe. Spain broke its June heat record, and extreme temperatures are expected to move toward Germany by midweek.
articles.content:
Authorities in Spain on Monday confirmed the country's highest-ever June temperature, as an ongoing heat wave pushed the mercury at one point on Saturday to 46 degrees Celsius (115 F).
